verb.description: Tell someone about something; give an account of an event or experience.
examples: I recounted the tale to Steve
he recounts how they often talked of politics

noun.description: An act or instance of giving an account of an event or experience.
examples: one woman's recount of a prolonged battle with “huge centipedes.”

origin: Late Middle English: from Old Northern French reconter tell again, based on Old French counter (see count).
